programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Cody encounters wild animals and thrilling attractions in abandoned Six Flags New Orleans; Josh is in Cyprus where the U.N. peacekeeping force allows him to explore the abandoned Nicosia International Airport and the UN buffer zone.

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Together with rooftopper Elaina Hammeken, Josh explores a radio telescope from the Soviet era in Armenia; Cody takes a trip through the Greek mining industry of Ptolemaida with traveling companion Elvis Brauer.

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Josh and explorer Steve Duncan travel to Tallinn in Estonia where they explore Patarei Prison; in Vietnam, Cody and his friend, Sherman Mak, travels to Pan Thiet in search of abandoned amusement park Soui Cat.

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Urban explorers Josh and Cody visit Germany and Morocco in search of astonishing abandoned locations including Wünsdorf, the forbidden city near Berlin, and an abandoned film set in the Sahara desert used for "Game of Thrones."

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: In Georgia, Cody and roof-topper Harry Gallagher ride in a cable car known as Stalin's coffin; in France, Josh searches for abandoned chateaus with globetrotter Lexie Limitless.

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Josh and Cody dive into the underworld; Josh explores the abandoned German mining industry and has an encounter with a police squad; in England, Cody explores an old Soviet submarine in the River Medway.

programme.title: Science For Evil Geniuses
programme.sub-title: Design Me a Big Fat Laser
programme.desc: Number One hatches a string of dastardly plots from his hidden underground lair that his team of highly-qualified scientists have to deliver by testing the boundaries of technology and the plausibility of science.

programme.title: Science For Evil Geniuses
programme.sub-title: I Want to Steal Mother Nature's Powers
programme.desc: The minions explore how to control the weather.

programme.title: Science For Evil Geniuses
programme.desc: The minions are given the impossible task of building an actual planet.

programme.desc: The minions are ordered to create a superhuman army.

programme.sub-title: Create Me the Ultimate Surveillance State

programme.title: Science Vs. Terrorism
programme.desc: Unconventional and sometimes invisible weapons stoke fears and could mark the advent of a new era in global terrorism.

programme.title: Science Vs. Terrorism
programme.desc: To counter how terrorists are willing to die in attacks against military and civilian targets, scientists are trying to minimize the loss of life by using robots to mimic human senses and detect threats without being spotted.

programme.title: Science Vs. Terrorism
programme.desc: Computer engineers, security companies and scientists work with police forces and intelligence services to counter how extremist groups use digital media and the internet to strike fear.
